name: Gary Tong
tagline: University of Manitoba Biology 3rd year Computer Science Student (Former UWO Biology graduate)
body:
### Welcome to Gary Tong's personal page.
Hi, I'm Gary, a third year computer science student at the [University of Manitoba](http://umanitoba.ca/) in Winnipeg, Canada. Formally, I graduated as a double major in biology/medical science from the University of Western Ontario. My interests lie in big data, bioinformatics, statistical genetics and web development. Currently, I am the logistics coordinator for [HackCentral 2017](http://hackcentral.ca/), Manitoba's first ever student-collegiate hackathon happening February 17-19 at the University of Manitoba. 

### Combined background in biology and computer science
I was a summer student at Sickkids hospital research institute in Toronto and the Children's Hospital Research institute in Winnipeg (Studying shared genetic segments in Autism Spectrum Disorders)

##Resume
You can took a look at my work experience [here](http://www.resume.com/share/o2PtAkeD8j8NqssDf)

###  Contact
You can contact me at tongg@myumanitoba.ca or by phone at 204-990-3698
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
